overview: TransSensual presents four forbidden and erotically charged love stories featuring beautiful TS girls indulging in romantic trysts with gorgeous cis girls, proving love has no bounds and the forbidden always taste the sweetest! Starring TS super stars Aubrey Kate, Chanel Santini, Kayleigh Coxx, Natalie Mars with starlets Violet Monroe, Sophia Grace, Riley Nixon and Rizzo Ford
title: TS Forbidden Love
